item.title: The DevOps Maturity Diagram
item.description:
The opening of my first Calm.io DevOps article started with:

Let me share what Iâ€™ve learned on my journey to DevOps: it is a culturally rendered term and it has a different meaning for everyone.

In that article, I go on to define DevOps and explain the term:

DevOps is the process of removing all friction
between the developer and customer value.

Let me share my experience to easily chart the progressive stages of DevOps maturity.
